import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Row, Container, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import CartCard from '../../components/CartCard'; import NavBar from '../../components/NavBar'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { alertActions, cartActions } from '../../redux/actions'; function CartPage() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const cartItems = useSelector(state => state.userCart.cartItems); const userId = useSelector(state => state.userAuth.user.userId); const [cart, setCart] = useState(cartItems); useEffect(() => { dispatch(cartActions.view(userId)); }, [dispatch, userId]) return ( <>
